Beautiful Expressions LLC Capitol Heights MD 20743 map 866-456-4141 1 Recommendation hide Mrs. China Thank you soooo much for catering my 18th Birthday party the food and strawberry daiquiris... Jacinta Dorsey-Ford Beautiful Expressions, a small woman-owned business, opened its doors in the fall of 2008 and has been blossoming ever since. We can handle any job ! We take pride in providing you with exquisite quality and service. Our goal is to provide each client with an experience they will never forget. We are dedicated to serving each of our customers with love and compassion and the wealth of knowledge we bring to each event.
We love sharing our hospitality experiences with non-profit organizations as well as small businesses. We take your thoughts and ideas and make them a reality.
Beautiful Expressions Catering can provide you with meals for any upcoming lunches, meetings, and corporate events. Your staff or guests may require certain diabetic or dietary restrictions. Beautiful Expressions Catering offers a wide variety of breakfast foods, lunches, afternoon entrees, and snacks that will satisfy any customer.
We also provide full service catering for
Kids Parties, Office Parties, Annual BBQ's Church Banquets, Pastor Lunching, Conference, Late Meetings, Weddings, Receptions Additional Info: Beautiful Expressions is proud to be a sponsor of Against Drunk Driving for Teens Catering Florist Event&Party Planning
RANDELL'S creations catering service 8 trento court olde towne , Gaithersburg MD 20877 map 240-370-7868 0 Recommendations we cater for birthdays,weddings,anniversaries,cookouts,office parties,business meetings,football and basket ball parties,engagement parties,ect. we are a small home based catering service we work all over the Maryland,Washington dc,Virginia metro area we will work with any budget to get you what you need we accept cash,checks and credit cards.we appreciate your business and support as a result most of our business are from repeat customers so we always give discounts and running promotions to please our customers.we strive for excellence in everything we do we have a wide variety of dishes on our menu page on our website you can choose from our prices are more reasonable and we are more flexible than most catering service.we cater for birthdays,weddings,anniversaries,engagement,bachelor,bachelorette parties,cookouts,house parties,football,basketball,soccer,hockey,tennis parties,office parties,business meetings and much more.we give children.seniors and military discounts.visit us at www.randellscreationscateringservice.com call us today 2403707868 so we can cater your next event Additional Info: we are listed every week as the #1 small home based catering company in the metro area that will work with any ones budget to get them what they need and to wow their guests . Jamaican cuisines american cuisines
Cebiche House 117 N Frederick Ave , Gaithersburg MD 20877-2437 map (301) 330-2400 0 Recommendations Fine Peruvian dining, specializing in seafood. Lunch buffets. Live events on weekends. Cebiche House is owned and operated by Flavors of Peru, LLC. Cebiche House was opened near to Old Towne Gaithersburg on December 26th, 2010. Cebiche House is regarded as the headquarters of Peruvian cuisine in the United States. It is constantly evolving, thanks to the quality of its dishes. It is the only restaurant specializing in seafood and having dishes created in its own kitchen: (1)"Ceviche House"(the most popular), (2) skewered chicken in Pachamanca and Pisco sauce, and (3) the current sensation: Huancaina spaghetti with medallions. In Peru, the"Cebiche Club"brings together 32 exclusive restaurants specializing in seafood. Thirty (30) are in Peru and two (2) are in the United States: Panca in New York and Cebiche House in Washington DC. Additional Info: One of 2 members of Cebiche Club in USA Peruvian Restaurant Entertainment Buffet
Immaculate Cuisine 1620 St. Agnes Lane Suite A , Baltimore MD 21207 map 410-497-7205 0 Recommendations Private&Corporate Catering and Cafe Immaculate Cuisine by definition means a flawless style or quality of cooking. As a premier caterer servicing Maryland, DC, Virginia, Delaware, and Pennsylvania we take pride in living up to our defined name. We specialize in the provision of quality, imaginative and tasty cuisine to both private and corporate clients alike. Cafe Brunch Catering
Guardados 4918 Del Ray Avenue , Bethesda MD 20814-2512 map (301) 986-4920 1 Recommendation hide Last year when our son announced his engagement we couldn't think of any other catering service than... Reyna Guardado We are a casual Spanish Restaurant with a Catering company as well. We specialize in Spanish food with a fusion of Latin Food . We have all kind of special happy hour. For more info check our website www.guardadosnico.com/ In addition, We do all kind of catering of full and casual catering: Corporate, Business&Wedding
Terri's Table, A Personal Chef Service Fallston MD 21047 map 0 Recommendations Terri's Table is an in-home custom catering business, offering standard meal service, parties, wine and food tasting parties, and cooking classes. Terri's Table provides a custom meal service designed for busy families and singles who want to eat well but lack the time or expertise to prepare daily home-cooked meals. How many times have you headed home after a long, busy day and wondered,"What in the world am I going to do about dinner?"Imagine coming home to a fridge stocked with food freshly prepared just for you! My job is to make your life easier...to take menu planning, grocery shopping, cooking and cleaning up off your"to do"list! Let me, Chef Terri, spend the time doing what I love to do so that you can have more time and energy to do what you love to do. Terri's Table also specializes in dinner and cocktail parties, as well as custom wine and food tasting events. Cooking classes and gift certificates are available. Additional Info: Terri's Table specializes in healthy, great tasting food and can accomodate any dietary restrictions. Vegan/vegetarian, low fat, low cholesterol, gluten-free, diabetic menus are all available. Meal Preparation Small Gathering Catering Cooking Classes and Parties
Wellwood Yacht Club 523 Water Street , Charlestown MD 21914-1176 map 1 Recommendation hide Outstanding employer and a place to have a relaxing event with no issues. The food is fabulous... Kay C Marie Kravchuck Located in the historic town of Charlestown, Maryland, The Wellwood has been owned and operated by the Metz family for over 50 years. In the Late 1800's The Wellwood Club was originally a private Hunting and Fishing Club that was established as"An organization of optimists and humanitarians in the broadest sense. Its purpose is to promote the 'happy' habit; to reduce the friction of life to a minimum and increase the pleasure of existence to the maximum; to discourage strife and promote good fellowship."The second floor of The Wellwood holds rooms named for States that had sent letters to the Club, requesting that a room be named after their state so that their representative would have a place to call"home".
The Metz family acquired the Wellwood in 1958. We believe in using only choice meats, fresh seafood and fresh produce in preparing a quality meal for you&your guests. We hope to always make your visit special
Hot Spot Cool Eats 3028 Ocean Gtwy , Cambridge MD 21613-3405 map 0 Recommendations Casual dining- gourment hot dog menu, REAL soft serve ice cream, specialty sodas, unique retail items and local art, Beachin' handcut fries, etc Family and pet friendly, indoor and landscaped outdoor seating. Additional Info: Keep the Eastern Shore unique...support your local businesses. hot dogs
Todays Pizza Inc 1215 Annapolis Road # 209 , Odenton MD 21113-1396 map 0 Recommendations Very good food at good price. we are in Odenton. we Deliver to Odenton, Gambrills, Crofton, Severn, Fort Meade, and Hanover. Todays is your place for pizza in Odenton, today! In addition to a mouthwatering variety of classic and signature hand-tossed pizzas, our features a large selection of hot and cold sandwiches, pastas, burgers, fried chicken, buffalo wings, and fried sides and appetizers. You will not find a more diverse and delicious array of craveable food anywhere else in town, nor will you encounter a restaurant with firmer commitment to quality and freshness from the ingredients and preparation through to the final product. With our speedy delivery service and easy-to-use online ordering system, there's no excuse to put off until tomorrow what can be done today! SUBS Seafood
Cantina Mamma Lucia 1350 Dorsey Rd # M-N , Hanover MD 21076-1433 map 0 Recommendations Homemade classic Italian dishes, pizza, subs, and salads. Corporate and residential catering. Celebrating over 21 years in Hanover, Maryland. Cantina Mamma Lucia has been providing traditional Italian dining, pizza, and catering services to Hanover, MD and the surrounding areas since 1989. Beer and wine are also available as well as homemade desserts. Family owned and operated, you could meet one of the owners most days when you visit. The well-experienced staff is trained to offer many suggestions to please your cravings. Meals are prepared to order and can be created or adjusted to suit your dietary needs. Cantina Mamma Lucia offers seasonal patio dining and ample free parking. Corporate catering is a specialty as well as party trays for dinner parties. Order online or call ahead and use the curbside pick-up for carryout orders.
